    • checkChronusEffect

      private void checkChronusEffect​(Match match) throws EndMatchException
      method that sets the effect of chronus if it is activated. necessary since chronus is an ALWAYS_ACTIVE like effect, unique in its genre
      Parameters:
      match - the match where Chronus is activated
      Throws:
      EndMatchException - when the condition of Instant Win of Chronus is met

    • reset

      The method resets the remainingActions, refilling it

    • handlePhases

      public void handlePhases​(Match match) throws EndMatchException
      The method manages the various Phases of the match calling the respective Manager for each PhaseType
      Parameters:
      match - is the reference to the match controlled by the controller
      Throws:
      EndMatchException - when the match ends and the players have to be notified

    • requestManager

      public void requestManager​(ActionType action, Match match, Message message) throws EndMatchException
      method that satisfies specific requested actions, sending messages or calling action of action logic
      Parameters:
      action - the requested action
      match - the associated match
      message - the message that gives some more information
      Throws:
      EndMatchException - when s player wins the match

    • standByPhaseManager

      private void standByPhaseManager​(Match match, PhaseType phase) throws EndMatchException
      the method manages the operations that the controller has do in this phase. Especially it checks if the godâ€™s power can be activated by the player if it is not mandatory, in the other case it will be activated automatically if his activation requirements are fulfilled
      Parameters:
      match - is the reference to the match controlled by the controller
      phase - is the Phase that would be handled.
      Throws:
      EndMatchException - when the match ends and all the players currently in the match have to be notified
